praveenbingo commented on pull request #4591: ARROW-4923: [Java] Add methods to set long value at given index in DecimalVector
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4591#discussion_r294197673
 
 

 ##########
 File path: java/vector/src/main/java/org/apache/arrow/vector/util/DecimalUtility.java
 ##########
 @@ -204,6 +205,16 @@ public static void writeBigDecimalToArrowBuf(BigDecimal value, ArrowBuf bytebuf,
     writeByteArrayToArrowBuf(bytes, bytebuf, index, padValue);
   }
 
+  /**
+   * Write the given long to the ArrowBuf at the given value index.
+   */
+  public static void writeLongToArrowBuf(long value, ArrowBuf bytebuf, int index) {
+    final long startIndex = bytebuf.memoryAddress() + index * DECIMAL_BYTE_LENGTH;
 
 Review comment:
   addressOfValue might be a better name..

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
Add new set methods on DecimalVector to take long and double inputs.

Methods should set Decimal value at given index like other setters available.
fields.summary: Expose setters for Decimal vector that take long and double inputs
